name: Smart&Soft
description:
Smart&Soft is a software mobile agency dedicated to developing business-critical mobile applications for clients. 
Smart&Soft authors Software as a Service (SaaS) mobile-dedicated platforms, which leverages end-user re-engagement, optimizes ads revenues, and enables users to control applications remotely. Because leveraging software is all about building blocs, Smart&Soft designs and develops Android and iOS framework libraries, which harness, promotes reuse, and accelerate applications development.
